_header: God grant them heaven bliss to meed / That harken…
Title(s): The Romance of Guy of Warwick
_description: The Romance of Guy of Warwick: the story of Guy after marriage — 299 12-line stanzas.

NLS1921.First Lines:
God graunt hem heuen blis to medeÞat herken to mi romaunce
                    rede…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Þat we may þat ioie com toAmen par
                    charite
